feed.title: News
feed.subtitle: Play DDO Unlimted For FREE! The only MMO with kick-ass combat, killer dungeons, and iconic D&D monsters!

entry.title: Festivult Bonus XP!
entry.summary:
Celebrate Festivult and ring in the New Year with bonus XP for all!

Starting today, December 17th, through Sunday January 3rd, all DDO Players will gain a 20% XP bonus in quests! This bonus stacks with Experience Elixirs! Happy Festivult!
entry.content:
Celebrate Festivult and ring in the New Year with bonus XP for all!

Starting today, December 17th, through Sunday January 3rd, all DDO Players will gain a 20% XP bonus in quests! This bonus stacks with Experience Elixirs! Happy Festivult!

entry.title: Ten Ton Hammer, ZAM, and MMORPG check out Update 2!
entry.summary:
"Turbine has gone the extra mile in this update to bring fresh ideas to the genre. Forget what you think you know about MMOGs." - Ten Tom Hammer

"All in all, Update 2 is definitely shaping up to be a great addition to the already robust content available in DDO." - ZAM

"Like the Path of Inspiration, the Dreaming Dark adventure pack is exciting and challenging, completing the rich storyline that begun in the last update. Many secrets await the inquisitive, and lots of new features and puzzles will leave you incredibly satisfied with the new quests." - MMORPG

Read the articles, and if you're a VIP experience the Adventure Pack yourself now!
entry.content:
"Turbine has gone the extra mile in this update to bring fresh ideas to the genre. Forget what you think you know about MMOGs." - Ten Tom Hammer

"All in all, Update 2 is definitely shaping up to be a great addition to the already robust content available in DDO." - ZAM

"Like the Path of Inspiration, the Dreaming Dark adventure pack is exciting and challenging, completing the rich storyline that begun in the last update. Many secrets await the inquisitive, and lots of new features and puzzles will leave you incredibly satisfied with the new quests." - MMORPG

Read the articles, and if you're a VIP experience the Adventure Pack yourself now!

entry.title: Countdown to Festivult 2009!
entry.summary: The Festivult season is only 7 days away! What is Festivult you ask? The Festival of the Twelfth Moon, or "Festivult" as it's fondly referred to, is an annual holiday celebration in DDO Unlimited!
entry.content: The Festivult season is only 7 days away! What is Festivult you ask? The Festival of the Twelfth Moon, or "Festivult" as it's fondly referred to, is an annual holiday celebration in DDO Unlimited!

entry.title: DDO through different eyes!

entry.title: A Holiday Gift for VIPs
entry.summary: Have you been eyeing that shiny set of armor in the DDO Store? Are you thinking about a daring new hair style for the New Year? Well now it can be yours free!  For the holidays we are giving all DDO: Eberron Unlimited VIPs a gift...

entry.title: New Server Opening Wednesday!
entry.summary: Due to the overwhelming success of Dungeons & Dragons Online®: Eberron Unlimited™ and the massive growth in our player population, we’re proud to announce that a new high-capacity server world is opening on November 4, 2009! The new server is named Orien, after the famous Dragonmarked noble house in Eberron. House Orien is an integral part of Xen'drik's trade and transportation systems due to their renowned magical travel and teleportation abilities.
entry.content: Due to the overwhelming success of Dungeons & Dragons Online®: Eberron Unlimited™ and the massive growth in our player population, we’re proud to announce that a new high-capacity server world is opening on November 4, 2009! The new server is named Orien, after the famous Dragonmarked noble house in Eberron. House Orien is an integral part of Xen'drik's trade and transportation systems due to their renowned magical travel and teleportation abilities.
